Add cities
 
Add a city by holding down the map to place a marker. If you want to add the city to favorites, press the message of the marker that is displayed.


Delete cities


To delete a city press the icon "X".


See the weather of a city


The Home screen displays the list of cities saved as favorites. Select a city from the list to know the weather information.
